attributes.action: Hold a General Election Because of the Imminent Change of Leaderships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair ...When you were voted into office you told everyone that you would do the full term...I am, and a lot of others are, very upset you are not, and feel that a change of leader (Mr Brown or Whoever it may be) should be decided by general vote by the people, after all it was YOU I and everyone else voted for (The Party Second)...
